plugin.name: JBehave Maven Plugin
plugin.description: JBehave is a project that supports and facilitates Behaviour-Driven Development.

mojo.description: Mojo to report stepdocs for the {@link Embeddable} instances provided (more specifically instances of {@link ConfiguredEmbedder} which provides both {@link Configuration} and {@link CandidateSteps}).

parameter.name: annotatedEmbedderRunnerClass
parameter.description: The annotated embedder runner class

parameter.name: batch
parameter.description: The boolean flag to run in batch mode

parameter.name: compileClasspathElements
parameter.description: Compile classpath.

parameter.name: embedderClass
parameter.description: The embedder class

parameter.name: excludes
parameter.description: Exclude filters, relative to the root source directory determined by the scope

parameter.name: executorsClass
parameter.description: The implementation class of the {@link ExecutorServiceFactory}

parameter.name: generateViewAfterStories
parameter.description: The boolean flag to generate view after stories are run

parameter.name: ignoreFailureInStories
parameter.description: The boolean flag to ignore failure in stories

parameter.name: ignoreFailureInView
parameter.description: The boolean flag to ignore failure in view

parameter.name: includes
parameter.description: Include filters, relative to the root source directory determined by the scope

parameter.name: injectableEmbedderClass
parameter.description: The class that is injected with the embedder

parameter.name: metaFilters
parameter.description: The meta filter

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: The scope of the mojo classpath, either "compile" or "test"

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: The boolean flag to skip stories

parameter.name: storyFinderClass
parameter.description: Used to find story paths and class names

parameter.name: storyTimeoutInSecs
parameter.description: The story timeout in secs

parameter.name: systemProperties
parameter.description: The system properties

parameter.name: testClasspathElements
parameter.description: Test classpath.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.description: The number of threads

parameter.name: verboseFailures
parameter.description: The boolean flag to output failures in verbose mode

parameter.name: verboseFiltering
parameter.description: The boolean flag to output filtering in verbose mode

mojo.description: Mojo to report stepdocs given a fully configured {@link Embedder} instance.

mojo.description: Mojo that runs stories with {@link AnnotatedEmbedderRunner}, equivalent to execution via JUnit's {@link RunWith}.

parameter.description: The annotated embedder runner class

parameter.name: batch
parameter.description: The boolean flag to run in batch mode

parameter.description: The implementation class of the {@link ExecutorServiceFactory}

parameter.name: generateViewAfterStories
parameter.description: The boolean flag to generate view after stories are run

parameter.name: ignoreFailureInStories
parameter.description: The boolean flag to ignore failure in stories

parameter.name: ignoreFailureInView
parameter.description: The boolean flag to ignore failure in view

parameter.description: Include filters, relative to the root source directory determined by the scope

parameter.description: The class that is injected with the embedder

parameter.name: metaFilters
parameter.description: The meta filter

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: The scope of the mojo classpath, either "compile" or "test"

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: The boolean flag to skip stories

parameter.name: storyFinderClass
parameter.description: Used to find story paths and class names

parameter.name: storyTimeoutInSecs
parameter.description: The story timeout in secs

parameter.name: systemProperties
parameter.description: The system properties

parameter.name: testClasspathElements
parameter.description: Test classpath.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.description: The number of threads

parameter.name: verboseFailures
parameter.description: The boolean flag to output failures in verbose mode

parameter.name: verboseFiltering
parameter.description: The boolean flag to output filtering in verbose mode

mojo.description: Mojo to unpack resources to view directory, whose location is derived from the configured StoryReporterBuilder accessible from the Embedder.
